name: corruption/blight
desc: Bring corruption and decay to all who oppose you.

name: corruption/blood
desc: Harness the power of blood, both your own and your foes'.

name: corruption/bone
desc: Harness the power of bones.

name: corruption/curses
desc: Curse your foes, hindering and crippling them.

name: corruption/hexes
desc: Hex your foes, hindering and crippling them.

name: corruption/horror spells
desc: Spell talents of the various horrors of the world.

name: corruption/other
desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

name: corruption/plague
desc: Spread diseases to your foes.

name: corruption/reaving combat
desc: Enhanced melee combat through the dark arts.

name: corruption/sanguisuge
desc: Manipulate life force to feed your own dark powers.

name: corruption/scourge
desc: Bring pain and destruction to the world.

name: corruption/Shadowflame
desc: Harness the power of the demonic shadowflame.

name: corruption/torment
desc: All the tools to torment your foes.

name: corruption/vile life
desc: Manipulate life for your vile needs.

name: corruption/vim
desc: Touch the very essence of your victims.

name: misc/object techniques
desc: Powers of the various objects of the world.

name: psionic/absorption
desc: Absorb damage and gain energy.

name: psionic/augmented mobility
desc: Use energy to move yourself and others.

name: psionic/augmented striking
desc: Augment melee attacks with psionic enegies.

name: psionic/charged mastery
desc: Mastery of electrokinetic forces.

name: psionic/discharge
desc: Project feedback on the world around you.

name: psionic/distortion
desc: Distort reality with your mental energy.

name: psionic/Dream Forge
desc: Master the dream forge to create powerful armor and effects.

name: psionic/Dream Smith
desc: Call the dream-forge hammer to smite your foes.

name: psionic/dreaming
desc: Manipulate the sleep cycles of yourself and your enemies.

name: psionic/feedback
desc: Store feedback as you get damaged and use it to protect and heal your body.

name: psionic/finer energy manipulations
desc: Subtle applications of the psionic arts.

name: psionic/focus
desc: Use gems to focus your energies.

name: psionic/horror techniques
desc: Psionic talents of the various horrors of the world.

name: psionic/kinetic mastery
desc: Mastery of telekinetic forces.

name: psionic/mentalism
desc: Various mind based effects.

name: psionic/nightmare
desc: Manifest your enemies nightmares.

name: psionic/other
desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

name: psionic/projection
desc: Project energy to damage foes.

name: psionic/psi-fighting
desc: Wield melee weapons with mentally-manipulated forces.

name: psionic/Psychic Assault
desc: Directly attack your opponents minds.

name: psionic/slumber
desc: Force enemies into a deep sleep.

name: psionic/solipsism
desc: Nothing exists outside the minds ability to perceive it.

name: psionic/thermal mastery
desc: Mastery of pyrokinetic forces.

name: psionic/Thought-Forms
desc: Manifest your thoughts as psionic summons.

name: psionic/voracity
desc: Pull energy from your surroundings.

name: celestial/chants
desc: Chant the glory of the Sun.

name: celestial/circles
desc: Bind the power of the Moon into circles at your feet.

name: celestial/combat
desc: Your devotion allows you to combat your foes with indomitable determination.

name: celestial/crusader
desc: Forgo your shield for the chance to crush your foes with a mighty two handed weapon.

name: celestial/eclipse
desc: The moment of the Eclipse is the moment of Truth, when Sun and Moon are in tandem and the energies of the world hang in the balance. Intense focus allows the greatest Anorithils to harness these energies to unleash devastating forces...

name: celestial/glyphs
desc: Bind the brilliant powers into glyphs to trap your foes.

name: celestial/guardian
desc: Your devotion grants you additional protection.

name: celestial/hymns
desc: Chant the glory of the Moon.

name: celestial/light
desc: Invoke the power of the light to heal and mend.

name: celestial/other
desc: Various celestial talents.

name: celestial/radiance
desc: You channel the light of the sun through your body.

name: celestial/star fury
desc: Call the fury of the Stars and the Moon to destroy your foes.

name: celestial/sun
desc: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.

name: celestial/sunlight
desc: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.

name: celestial/twilight
desc: Stand between the darkness and the light, harnessing both.

name: chronomancy/Age Manipulation
desc: Manipulate the age of creatures you encounter.

name: chronomancy/anomalies
desc: Spacetime anomalies that can randomly occur when paradox is to high.

name: chronomancy/Blade Threading
desc: A blend of chronomancy and dual-weapon combat.

name: chronomancy/Bow Threading
desc: A blend of chronomancy and ranged combat.

name: chronomancy/Chronomancy
desc: Allows you to glimpse the future, or become more aware of the present.

name: chronomancy/energy
desc: Manipulate raw energy by addition or subtraction.

name: chronomancy/Fate Weaving
desc: Weave the threads of fate.

name: chronomancy/flux
desc: Fluctuate spacetime.

name: chronomancy/gravity
desc: Call upon the force of gravity to crush, push, and pull your foes.

name: chronomancy/Manifold
desc: Passive effects that Weapon Folding can trigger.

name: chronomancy/matter
desc: Change and shape matter itself.

name: chronomancy/other
desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

name: chronomancy/Spacetime Folding
desc: Mastery of folding points in space.

name: chronomancy/Spacetime Weaving
desc: Weave the threads of spacetime.

name: chronomancy/Speed Control
desc: Control how fast objects and creatures move through spacetime.

name: chronomancy/Spellbinding
desc: Manipulate chronomantic spells.

name: chronomancy/stasis
desc: Stabilize spacetime.

name: chronomancy/Temporal Combat
desc: A blend of chronomancy and physical combat.

name: chronomancy/Temporal Guardian
desc: Warden combat training and techniques.

name: chronomancy/Temporal Hounds
desc: Call temporal hounds to aid you in combat.

name: chronomancy/Threaded Combat
desc: A blend of ranged and dual-weapon combat.

name: chronomancy/Timeline Threading
desc: Examine and alter the timelines that make up the spacetime continuum.

name: chronomancy/timetravel
desc: Directly manipulate the flow of time

name: undead/base
desc: Undead's innate abilities.

desc: Ghoul's innate abilities.

desc: Keepsake shadows's innate abilities.

desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

desc: Skeleton's innate abilities.

name: base/class
desc: The basic talents defining a class.

name: base/race
desc: The various racial bonuses a character can have.

name: wild-gift/antimagic
desc: The way to combat magic, or even nullify it.

name: wild-gift/call of the wild
desc: Be at one with nature.

name: wild-gift/cold drake aspect
desc: Take on the defining aspects of a Cold Drake.

name: wild-gift/corrosive blades
desc: You channel acid through your psiblades.

name: wild-gift/eyal's fury
desc: Unleash nature's fury against foes around you.

name: wild-gift/fire drake aspect
desc: Take on the defining aspects of a Fire Drake.

name: wild-gift/fungus
desc: By covering yourself in fungus, you better your healing.

name: wild-gift/harmony
desc: Nature heals and cleans you.

name: wild-gift/higher draconic abilities
desc: Take on the aspects of aged and powerful dragons.

name: wild-gift/horror techniques
desc: Psionic talents of the various horrors of the world.

name: wild-gift/mindstar mastery
desc: Learn to channel your mental power through mindstars, forming powerful psionic blades.

name: wild-gift/moss
desc: You learn to control moss, making it grow at will to help you on the battlefield.

name: wild-gift/mucus
desc: Cover the floor with natural mucus.

name: wild-gift/object techniques
desc: Wild gifts of the various objects of the world.

name: wild-gift/ooze
desc: Your body and internal organs are becoming more ooze-like in nature, allowing you to spawn more of you.

name: wild-gift/oozing blades
desc: You channel ooze through your psiblades.

name: wild-gift/other
desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

name: wild-gift/sand drake aspect
desc: Take on the defining aspects of a Sand Drake.

name: wild-gift/slime
desc: Through dedicated consumption of slime mold juice, you have gained an affinity with slime molds.

name: wild-gift/storm drake aspect
desc: Take on the defining aspects of a Storm Drake.

name: wild-gift/summoning (advanced)
desc: The art of improving the quality of your summons.

name: wild-gift/summoning (augmentation)
desc: The art of manipulating the lifespan and location of your summons.

name: wild-gift/summoning (distance)
desc: The art of calling creatures adept in elemental destruction to your aid.

name: wild-gift/summoning (melee)
desc: The art of calling creatures adept in melee combat to your aid.

name: wild-gift/summoning (utility)
desc: The art of calling versatile creatures to your aid.

name: wild-gift/venom drake aspect
desc: Take on the defining aspects of a Venom Drake.

name: inscriptions/infusions
desc: Infusions are not class abilities, you must find them or learn them from other people.

name: inscriptions/runes
desc: Runes are not class abilities, you must find them or learn them from other people.

name: inscriptions/taints
desc: Taints are not class abilities, you must find them or learn them from other people.

desc: Alchemical control over acid.

name: spell/advanced-golemancy
desc: Advanced golem operations.

name: spell/aegis
desc: Command the arcane forces into healing and protection.

name: spell/aether
desc: Tap on the core arcane forces of the aether, unleashing devastating effects on your foes.

name: spell/air
desc: Harness the power of the air to fry your foes.

name: spell/animus
desc: Crush the souls of your foes to improve yourself.

name: spell/arcane
desc: Arcane studies manipulate the raw magic energies to shape them into both offensive and defensive spells.

name: spell/conveyance
desc: Conveyance is the school of travel. It allows you to travel faster and to track others.

name: spell/divination
desc: Divination allows the caster to sense its surroundings, and find hidden things.

name: spell/earth
desc: Harness the power of the earth to protect and destroy.

name: spell/energy alchemy
desc: Alchemical control over lightning energies.

name: spell/enhancement
desc: Magical enhancement of your body.

name: spell/explosive admixtures
desc: Manipulate gems to turn them into explosive magical bombs.

desc: Harness the power of fire to burn your foes to ashes.

desc: Alchemical control over fire.

desc: Alchemical control over frost.

desc: Learn to craft and upgrade your golem.

desc: Learn to craft and upgrade your golem.

name: spell/grave
desc: Use the rotting cold doom of the tomb to fell your foes.

desc: Spell talents of the various horrors of the world.

name: spell/ice
desc: Harness the power of ice to freeze and shatter your foes.

name: spell/meta
desc: Meta spells alter the working of magic itself.

name: spell/necrosis
desc: Gain control over death, eventually turning into a lich.

name: spell/necrotic minions
desc: Create and empower dumb undead minions.

name: spell/nightfall
desc: Manipulate darkness itself to slaughter your foes.

desc: Spell abilities of the various objects of the world.

desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

desc: Control the power of tricks and illusions.

name: spell/shades
desc: Invoke and control shades.

desc: Harness the power of the stone to protect and destroy.

desc: Manipulate gems, and imbue their powers into other objects.

name: spell/stone alchemy
desc: Alchemical control over stone and gems.

name: spell/storm
desc: Harness the power of the storm to incinerate your foes.

desc: The school of time manipulation.

desc: Harness the power of water to drown your foes.

name: spell/wildfire
desc: Harness the power of wildfire to burn your foes to ashes.

desc: Specialized sling techniques.

desc: Advanced combat tactics.

desc: Fear nothing!

desc: Delight in the act of battle and the spilling of blood.

desc: Mastery over their shields separates Skirmishers from Archers, and gives them an edge.

desc: Generic combat oriented techniques.

desc: Teaches to use various armours, weapons and improves health.

desc: Generic combat oriented techniques.

desc: Specialized dual wielding techniques.

desc: Specialized dual wielding techniques.

name: technique/field control
desc: Control the battlefield using various techniques.

desc: Finishing moves that use combo points and may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

desc: Grappling techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

desc: Physical talents of the various horrors of the world.

desc: The blending together of magic and melee prowess.

name: technique/mobility
desc: Controlling your movements on the battlefields is the sure way to victory.

desc: Techniques of the various objects of the world.

desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

desc: Specialized weapon and shield techniques.

desc: Specialized weapon and shield techniques.

desc: Slings! Pow Pow!

desc: Advanced combat techniques.

name: technique/thuggery
desc: Whatever wins the day, wins the day.

desc: Your will carries you through the most difficult struggles, allowing you to fight on when others would have collapsed from exhaustion.

desc: Specialized two-handed techniques.

desc: Specialized two-handed techniques.

desc: Specialized two-handed techniques.

desc: Base martial arts attack and stances.

desc: Teaches various martial arts techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

name: technique/warcries
desc: Master the warcries to improve yourself and weaken others.

name: other/horror powers
desc: Unclassified talents of the various horrors of the world.

desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.

name: cursed/cursed aura
desc: The things you surround yourself with soon wither away.

name: cursed/cursed form
desc: You are wracked with the dark energies of the curse.

name: cursed/curses
desc: The effects of cursed objects.

name: cursed/dark sustenance
desc: Invoke the powerful force of your will.

name: cursed/darkness
desc: Harness the power of darkness to envelop your foes.

name: cursed/endless hunt
desc: Each day, you lift your weary body and begin the unending hunt.

name: cursed/fears
desc: Use the fear that lies at the heart of your curse to attack the minds of your enemies.

name: cursed/force of will
desc: Invoke the powerful force of your will.

name: cursed/gestures
desc: Enhance the power of you mind with gestures.

name: cursed/gloom
desc: All those in your sight must share your despair.

name: cursed/one with shadows
desc: Harness your shadows to their full potential.

name: cursed/predator
desc: Track and kill your prey with single-minded focus.

name: cursed/punishments
desc: Your hate becomes punishment in the minds of your foes.

name: cursed/rampage
desc: Let loose the hate that has grown within.

name: cursed/shadows
desc: Summon shadows from the darkness to aid you.

name: cursed/slaughter
desc: Your weapon yearns for its next victim.

name: cursed/strife
desc: The battlefield is your home; death and confusion, your comfort.

name: cunning/ambush
desc: Using darkness and a bit of magic, you manipulate the shadows.

name: cunning/Called Shots
desc: Inflict maximum pain to specific places on your enemies.

name: cunning/dirty fighting
desc: Teaches various talents to cripple your foes.

name: cunning/lethality
desc: How to make your foes feel the pain.

name: cunning/poisons
desc: The knowledge of poisons and how to apply them to 'good' effects.

name: cunning/poisons
desc: Collection of known poisons.

name: cunning/scoundrel
desc: The use of ungentlemanly techniques.

name: cunning/shadow magic
desc: Blending magic and shadows.

name: cunning/stealth
desc: Allows the user to enter stealth.

name: cunning/survival
desc: The knowledge of the dangers of the world, and how to best avoid them.

name: cunning/tactical
desc: Tactical combat abilities.

name: cunning/trapping
desc: The knowledge of trap laying and assorted trickeries.

name: cunning/traps
desc: Collection of known traps.
